content: a court in monza has issued a final resolution regarding the dissolution of a community inheritance after the death of two individuals the plaintiff requested the dissolution and proposed either a cash settlement or the sale of the properties through an auction the defendant argued against the dissolution and proposed dividing the estate to continue a business an expert assessed the divisibility of the estate and determined it could be divided into two lots the courtappointed expert provided a vertical division plan but the plaintiff preferred a horizontal division the court decided to allocate one lot to the plaintiff and the other to the defendant the plaintiffs claim for reimbursement of expenses was dismissed the court also ordered both parties to share the costs of the proceedings and the experts report
